info.name: Fido API Docs
info.description:
FIDO API let you access to database information
Contact Support: Name: Fido Tech Email: sales@fido.tech

request.description:
# Returns all the mobile app users for the organization.

## Returns
 ********* 
**List[Users]**

request.description:
# Returns the last seen information for a given dates and for a given company.

## Parameter
 ******** 
**date_from**: datetime.date    
 First day included

**date_to**: datetime.date   
 Last day included

## Returns
 ******** 
**List[BugActivity]**

response.name: Successful Response

request.description:
# Download audio recording for a given recording ID

## Parameters
 ******* 
**recording_id** : int, optional    
 The ID of the recording to get

**session** : Session, optional    
 Injected session object

## Returns
 ********* 
**FileResponse**    
 Returning the link to download the audio file

request.description:
# Download Short-Time Fourier Transformation(stft .png), Power Spectral Density (psd .png)     
# and Sound file (.wav) for a given recording ID

## Parameters
 ******* 
**recording_id** : int, optional    
 The ID of the recording to get

**session** : Session, optional    
 Injected session object

## Returns
 ********* 
**StreamingResponse**    
 Returning the Zip file with the three files included

request.description:
# Returns the list of Recordings for the company.

## Parameters
 ******* 
**session**: Session    
 DB session

**date_from**: datetime.date             
 First day included

**date_to**: datetime.date             
 Last day included

## Returns
 -------- 
List[BugRecording]

request.description:
# Returns the list of the Leak Alarms. The leak alarm is the function in the FIDOApp 
# enabling water engineers to mark their current location as the point of interest POI.  

## Returns
 ********* 
**List[LeakAlarm]**

response.name: Successful Response

request.description:
# AI Prediction for the given file

## Parameters
 ******** 
**file** : UploadFile   
 File to upload to do the prediction

**sensor** : SensorType, optional  
 Sensor type, by default SensorType.halma

## Returns
 ******* 
**Prediction**  
 Prediction Schema
